GK16mamkavpu:4511: śleṣopamāyāstu sa viṣayaḥ yatropamānasyopādānamantareṇa sādhāraṇeṣvapi viśeṣaṇeṣu na tathā pratītiḥ / yathā
GK16mamkavpu:4515: aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmapi upameyam anayaiva rītyā pratītaṃ na punaḥ prayogeṇa kadarthatāṃ neyam / yathā
GK16mamkavpu:4518: khadyoto 'pi na kampate pracalituṃ madhye 'pi tejasvināṃ
GK16mamkavpu:4521: atra acetanasya prabhoraprastutaviśiṣṭasāmānyadvāreṇābhivyaktau na yuktameva punaḥ kathanam //
GK16mamkavpu:4522: tadeta alaṅkāradoṣāḥ yathāsaṃbhāvinonye 'pyevañjātīyakāḥ pūrvoktayaiva doṣajātyā antarbhāvitāḥ na pṛthag pratipādanamarhantīti saṃpūrṇamidaṃ kāvyalakṣaṇam //142//
GK16mamkavpu:4524: na tadvicitraṃ yadamutra samyagvinirmitā saṃghaṭanaiva hetuḥ //1//}
